Class_Quest_Name_A Game of Life and Deat: A Game of Life and Death
Class_Quest_Name_Once Upon a Time in Dom: Once Upon a Time in Doma
Class_Skill_Desc_Aeolian Edge: Delivers an attack with a potency of 5,000.</br>Combo Action: Gust Slash</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Arm's Length: Creates a barrier nullifying most knockback and draw-in effects.</br>Duration: 6s</br>Additional Effect: Slow +20% when barrier is struck</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Armor Crush: Delivers an attack with a potency of 140.</br>200 when executed from a target's flank.</br>Combo Action: Gust Slash</br>Combo Potency: 360</br>Flank Combo Potency: 420</br>Combo Bonus: Extends Huton duration by 30s to a maximum of 60s</br>Combo Bonus: Increases Ninki Gauge by 15//
Class_Skill_Desc_Assassinate: Delivers an attack with a potency of 12,000.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Hidden.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Bhavacakra: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 350.</br>Meisui Bonus: Potency is increased to 500 when under the effect of Meisui</br>//Ninki Gauge Cost: 50</br>Shares a recast timer with Hellfrog Medium.
Class_Skill_Desc_Bladedance: Delivers an attack with a potency of 5,250.
Class_Skill_Desc_Bloodbath: Converts a portion of physical damage dealt into HP.</br>Duration: 20s
Class_Skill_Desc_Braver: Delivers an attack with a potency of 2,400.
Class_Skill_Desc_Bunshin: For up to five attacks, your shadow becomes animate, attacking enemies each time you execute a weaponskill.</br>Shadow attack potency will match that of your weaponskills, but will be halved when executing Fuma Shuriken or Assassinate.</br>Duration: 20s</br>Additional Effect: Creates a shadow that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 8,000 potency</br>Duration: 10s</br>※Action changes to Huton while under the effect of Three Mudra.
Class_Skill_Desc_Chi: Make the ritual mudra hand gesture for “earth.”</br>Duration: 6s</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills, mudra, and Ninjutsu upon execution.</br>Conversely, execution of weaponskills triggers the cooldown of this action.
Class_Skill_Desc_Death Blossom: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Increases Ninki Gauge by 5//
Class_Skill_Desc_Doton: Creates a patch of corrupted earth under your feet, dealing damage with a potency of 3,000 to any enemies who enter.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Three Mudra.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Dream Within a Dream: Delivers a threefold attack, each hit with a potency of 150.
Class_Skill_Desc_Feint: Lowers target's physical damage dealt by 10% and magic damage dealt by 5%.</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_Fleeting Raiju: Rushes target and delivers an attack with a potency of 4,000.</br>Additional Effect: Stun</br>Duration: 2s</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Fleeting Raiju Ready.</br>Cannot be executed while bound.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Forked Raiju: Rushes target and delivers an attack with a potency of 4,000.</br>Additional Effect: Stun</br>Duration: 2s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Fleeting Raiju Ready</br>Duration: 10s</br>Cannot be executed while bound.</br>※Aeolian Edge Combo changes to Fleeting Raiju while under the effect of Fleeting Raiju Ready.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Fuma Shuriken: Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 6,000.</br>Maximum Charges: 3</br>This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.</br>※Action changes to Hyosho Ranryu while under the effect of Three Mudra.
Class_Skill_Desc_Goka Mekkyaku: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 4,000 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Additional Effect: Damage over time</br>Potency: 4,000</br>Duration: 12s</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Three Mudra.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Gust Slash: Delivers an attack with a potency of 4,000.</br>Combo Action: Spinning Edge</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Hakke Mujinsatsu: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.</br>Combo Action: Death Blossom</br>Combo Potency: 130</br>Combo Bonus: Extends Huton duration by 10s to a maximum of 60s</br>Combo Bonus: Increases Ninki Gauge by 5//
Class_Skill_Desc_Hellfrog Medium: Deals fire damage with a potency of 160 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Ninki Gauge Cost: 50</br>Shares a recast timer with Bhavacakra.
Class_Skill_Desc_Hide: Blend in with your surroundings, making it impossible for most enemies to detect you, but reducing movement speed by 50%. Has no effect on enemies 10 levels higher than your own, or certain enemies with special sight.</br>Additional Effect: Restores 2 charges to all mudra</br>//The effect of Doton ends upon execution of Hide.</br>//Cannot be executed while in combat.</br>Effect ends upon use of any action other than Sprint, or upon reuse of Hide.
Class_Skill_Desc_Hollow Nozuchi: All enemies standing in the corrupted earth of Doton take additional earth damage with a potency of 50.</br>Requires Hakke Mujinsatsu to be executed as a combo action or upon executing Katon, Goka Mekkyaku, or Phantom Kamaitachi.</br>Effect can only be triggered while Doton is active.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Huraijin: Delivers an attack with a potency of 200.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Huton</br>Duration: 60s</br>Additional Effect: Increases Ninki Gauge by 5//
Class_Skill_Desc_Huton: Grants Huton, creating a barrier that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 16,000 potency, and increasing movement speed by 25%.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Movement speed returns to normal when barrier is completely absorbed.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Three Mudra.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Hyosho Ranryu: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 16,000.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Three Mudra.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Hyoton: Deals ice damage with a potency of 350.</br>Additional Effect: Bind</br>Duration: 15s</br>Mudra Combination: Ten→Jin or Chi→Jin</br>Cancels auto-attack upon execution.</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills, mudra, and Ninjutsu upon execution.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Jin: Make the ritual mudra hand gesture for “man.”</br>Duration: 6s</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills, mudra, and Ninjutsu upon execution.</br>Conversely, execution of weaponskills triggers the cooldown of this action.
Class_Skill_Desc_Kassatsu: Allows the execution of a single ninjutsu without consumption of mudra charges.</br>Additional Effect: Increases damage for the next ninjutsu action by 30%</br>Duration: 15s</br>Recast timer of mudra is not affected by the execution of this action.
Class_Skill_Desc_Katon: Deals fire damage with a potency of 350 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Mudra Combination: Chi→Ten or Jin→Ten</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills, mudra, and Ninjutsu upon execution.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Meisui: Restores own or target party member's HP.</br>Cure Potency: 8,000</br>Additional Effect: Grants healing over time effect to target</br>Cure Potency: 4,000</br>Duration: 15s</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Three Mudra.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Mug: Delivers an attack with a potency of 2,000.</br>Additional Effect: Increases target's damage taken by 10%</br>Duration: 10s</br>Additional Effect: Reduces the recast time of Fuma Shuriken by 10 seconds</br>※Action changes to Goka Mekkyaku while under the effect of Three Mudra.
Class_Skill_Desc_Ninjutsu: Executes a specific ninjutsu action coinciding with the combination of mudra made immediately beforehand.</br>If any other action is used before the mudra are combined and the ninjutsu executed, Ninjutsu will fail.</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills, mudra, and Ninjutsu upon execution.</br>Conversely, execution of weaponskills triggers the cooldown of this action.</br>Restores 2 charges to all mudra when Hide is executed while outside of combat.
Class_Skill_Desc_Phantom Kamaitachi: Your shadow deals wind damage to target and all enemies within 5 yalms with a potency of 600 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Extends Huton duration by 10s to a maximum of 60s</br>Additional Effect: Increases Ninki Gauge by 10</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Phantom Kamaitachi Ready.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Rabbit Medium: Thumpity thump thump, thumpity thump thump...
Class_Skill_Desc_Raiton: Deals lightning damage with a potency of 650.</br>Additional Effect: Grants a stack of Raiju Ready</br>Duration: 30s</br>Maximum Stacks: 3</br>Effect of Raiju Ready ends upon execution of any melee weaponskill.</br>//Mudra Combination: Ten→Chi or Jin→Chi</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills, mudra, and Ninjutsu upon execution.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Seiton Tenchu: Rushes target and delivers an attack with a potency of 12,000, incapacitating foes whose HP is below 50%.</br>Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Death Link</br>Duration: 4s</br>Defeating an enemy with this action, or one under the effect of Death Link, will grant Unsealed Seiton Tenchu, allowing a second execution of this action.</br>Duration: 8s</br>Effect duration is reduced by 1s each time it is applied to a target with a minimum duration of 4s.</br>Effect cannot be applied to players riding machina or non-player combatants.</br>Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full or while under the effect of Unsealed Seiton Tenchu.</br>Gauge Charge Time: 105s</br>Cannot be executed while bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_Shade Shift: Create shadows that nullify damage up to 20% of maximum HP.</br>Duration: 20s
Class_Skill_Desc_Shukuchi: Move quickly to the specified location.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Hidden</br>Hidden Effect: Blend in with your surroundings, making it impossible for enemies to see or target you</br>Duration: 4s</br>Effect ends upon use of any action or upon taking damage from an enemy.</br>Cannot be executed while bound.</br>※Action changes to Doton while under the effect of Three Mudra.</br>※Aeolian Edge Combo changes to Assassinate while under the effect of Hidden.
Class_Skill_Desc_Spinning Edge: Delivers an attack with a potency of 3,000.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Suiton: Deals water damage with a potency of 500.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Suiton</br>Duration: 20s</br>Suiton Effect: Allows execution of actions which require the effect of Hidden, without being under that effect</br>Mudra Combination: Ten→Chi→Jin or Chi→Ten→Jin</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills, mudra, and Ninjutsu upon execution.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Ten: Make the ritual mudra hand gesture for “heaven.”</br>Duration: 6s</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills, mudra, and Ninjutsu upon execution.</br>Conversely, execution of weaponskills triggers the cooldown of this action.
Class_Skill_Desc_Ten Chi Jin: Temporarily converts each of the three mudra into a ninjutsu action. Executing one of these actions will convert the remaining mudra into different ninjutsu actions until all three have been executed or the Ten Chi Jin effect expires.</br>Duration: 6s</br>Only ninjutsu available while active. The same ninjutsu cannot be executed twice.</br>Cannot be executed while under the effect of Kassatsu. Effect ends upon moving.
Class_Skill_Desc_Three Mudra: Grants Three Mudra, allowing for immediate execution of any ninjutsu action. However, the same ninjutsu action cannot be executed consecutively.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>※Action changes to Meisui while under the effect of Three Mudra.</br>※All actions except Seiton Tenchu will change to their respective ninjutsu actions while under the effect of Three Mudra.
Class_Skill_Desc_Throwing Dagger: Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 120.</br>Additional Effect: Increases Ninki Gauge by 5//
Class_Skill_Desc_Trick Attack: Delivers an attack with a potency of 300.</br>400 when executed from a target's rear.</br>Additional Effect: Increases damage you deal target by 10%</br>Duration: 15s</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Hidden.
Class_Skill_Desc_True North: Nullifies all action direction requirements.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Maximum Charges: 2
Class_Status_Desc_Bloodbath: Attacks generate HP equal to the amount of physical damage dealt.
Class_Status_Desc_Bunshin: Your corporeal shadow is performing an attack each time you execute a weaponskill.
Class_Status_Desc_Doton: Foul magicks corrupt the ground, dealing earth damage to any who tread upon it.
Class_Status_Desc_Feint: Sustaining increased damage from target who executed Feint.
Class_Status_Desc_Huton: A magicked barrier is nullifying damage while movement speed is increased.
Class_Status_Desc_Three Mudra: Able to execute any ninjutsu action.
Class_Status_Desc_Trick Attack: Damage taken from the ninja who applied this effect is increased.
Class_Trait_Desc_Adept Assassination: Upgrades Assassinate to Dream Within a Dream.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Kassatsu: Upgrades Katon and Hyoton to Goka Mekkyaku and Hyosho Ranryu while under the effect of Kassatsu.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Meisui: Increases the potency of Bhavacakra to 500 while under the effect of Meisui.</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Mug: Increases Ninki Gauge by 40 upon successfully landing Mug.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Raiton: Grants a stack of Raiju Ready upon executing Raiton.</br>Maximum Stacks: 3</br>Duration: 30s</br>Effect of Raiju Ready ends upon execution of any melee weaponskill.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Shukuchi: Resets the recast timer for Shukuchi upon executing Katon, Raiton, or Hyoton on most targets.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Shukuchi II: Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of  Shukuchi.</br>Maximum Charges: 2
Class_Trait_Desc_Melee Mastery: Increases the potency of Gust Slash to 120, Aeolian Edge to 140, and Armor Crush to 140.
Class_Trait_Desc_Melee Mastery II: Increases the potency of Spinning Edge to 220 and Gust Slash to 160.
Class_Trait_Desc_Shukiho: Increases Ninki Gauge by 5 upon successfully landing certain weaponskills or completing certain combos.
Class_Trait_Desc_Shukiho II: Increases Ninki Gauge by 10 upon successfully completing a combo with Aeolian Edge or Armor Crush.
Class_Trait_Desc_Shukiho III: Increases Ninki Gauge by 15 upon successfully completing a combo with Aeolian Edge or Armor Crush.
